name: ZX81 - Mage: The Enchanted Crystals (2018)
description:
While working on a powerful spell, Wizzy's father was being watched by others. 

As a precaution he captured the spell inside a crystal and divided it into 4 pieces, which he buried inside the mines, just south of your village. 

It is now up to you to collect these pieces and bring them together inside the enchanted chest to ensure the spell doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

Good Luck Wizzy!

Game Features:

- Available on Cassette Tape and as Digital Download
- Large world to explore
- Dedicated Chroma81 color support 
- Internet Highscore uploading
- Online rewards
- Support for AY-sound boards
- ZXpand joystick interface support
